remark.ch: 生物科技及生物多樣性第二專長

goal.en: The main objective of this course is to introduce the functions and the underlying molecular and cellular mechanisms of different physiological systems in our body. The gross and/or detail structures of the tissues and organs involving in each system is also expounded.
goal.ch: The main objective of this course is to introduce the functions and the underlying molecular and cellular mechanisms of different physiological systems in our body. The gross and/or detail structures of the tissues and organs involving in each system is also expounded.

content.en:
Feb 15/16 The study of body function (1; 黃)
Feb 22/23 Interactions between cells and the extracellular environment (6; 黃)
March 1/2 Endocrine glands: secretion and action of hormones (11; 黃)
March 8/9 Endocrine glands: secretion and action of hormones and The digestive system (11/18; 黃)
March 15/16 The nervous system: neurons and synapses (7; 黃)
March 22/23 The central nervous system (8; 黃)
March 29/30 The autonomic nervous system (9; 黃)
April 5/6 No class
April 12/13 mid-exam/ Blood, heart, and circulation (13; 黃)
April 19/20 Cardiac output, blood flow, and blood pressure (13; 黃)
April 26/27 Cardiac output, blood flow, and blood pressure (14; 黃)
May 3/4 Reproduction (20; 黃)
May 10/11 Reproduction (20; 黃)
May 17/18 Immune system (15; 羅)
May 24/25 Respiratory physiology (16; 羅)
May 31/June 1 Physiology of the kidney (16/17; 羅)
June 7/8 Physiology of the kidney (16/17; 羅)
June 14/15 Final examination (羅)

textbook.en: Stuart Ira Fox. Human Physiology, 15th Edition, McGraw Hill Co.
textbook.ch: Stuart Ira Fox. Human Physiology, 15th Edition, McGraw Hill Co.

grading.en: 1st exam (ch 1, 6, 11, 18)+ midterm exam ( ch 7,8,9) + 3rd exam (ch13,14,20) + final exam(ch 15, 16, 17) = 92%; Participation/ Attendance/Discussion (8%); Office hours: After 2:00 pm on Monday 1st exam and 3rd exam: arrange schedules for test **Note**: (1)上課時請勿使用筆電、手機等電子產品，違規一次者，上面課堂參與成績分數以扣1分計算之，依此類推。(2)請勿翹課，翹課1次者，上面課堂參與成績分數以扣2分計算之，依此類推。(提醒: 請同學留意一下校方學則內第二篇與『學士班』相關之規定。)

ch: 系所:限生命科學系。年級:限三年級。
